mapper.select: SELECT u.userSeq, u.email, u.password, u.role, u.nickname, u.provider, u.createdAt, u.modifiedAt FROM USER_INFO u WHERE u.userSeq = #{userSeq}
SELECT u.userSeq, u.email, u.role, u.nickname, u.provider, u.createdAt, u.modifiedAt FROM USER_INFO u LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO(email, password, role, nickname, provider, createdAt, modifiedAt) VALUES(#{email}, #{password}, #{role}, #{nickname}, #{provider}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_INFO u WHERE u.userSeq = #{userSeq}
